class.name: MediaPipeAudioEmbedder
class.description: MediaPipe audio task for performing audio embedding extraction on audio clips or audio stream.

method.name: embed
method.description: Performs audio embedding extraction on [param audio_data]. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeAudioTask.RUNNING_MODE_AUDIO_CLIPS].

method.name: embed_async
method.description: Sends [param audio_data] to perform audio embedding extraction. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeAudioTask.RUNNING_MODE_AUDIO_STREAM].

signal.name: result_callback
signal.description: Emitted when audio embedder initialized with [constant MediaPipeAudioTask.RUNNING_MODE_AUDIO_STREAM] returns embedding result.
